website_summaries.verdict: With its excellent hardware keyboard, BlackBerry's Android-powered KeyOne phone is a messaging marvel for a niche audience.

customer_reviews.title: Classy Phone
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking phone. All my usual Apps installed and run at good speed. Really like the keyboard - this is my first Blackberry. I find it much better than a virtual one. Amazon dropped the price by £53 immediately after I bought it, which has really soured the experience. If you are thinking of buying one, track Amazons prices first as this phone fluctuates a lot. At time of writing this review it is £433.
customer_reviews.author: Daron

customer_reviews.title: Finally; a power phone
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I have ever purchased (adjusting for era) keyboard is so handy to use, I have no idea why we even moved away from them.. Hotkeys, shortcuts, touch typing, scrolling.. Fab Everything else is perfect android.. Decent but not huge screen, awesome battery life (~5-6 hrs screen time with 4g on, although mine is pretty new), nice and loud speaker so you can listen to audiobooks without speakers.. Etc etc Cant wait to throw my bloated, 2 pump-chump old phone into the sea!! Just a pity its not waterproof rated.. but you cant have everything I guess
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is not an old, good BlackBerry!
customer_reviews.text: If you go for BB because of OS then do not buy this one. Phone itself is ok. Nice camera(small problems with AF when you take a pic from a few cm distance), nice speakers, great design, top quality materials and physical keyboard(love it). Sounds good? Yes, but...there is Android. In my opinion Android is the worst mobile OS. I just hate it! I'd pay twice as much for this phone if there was BB OS. If you like Android go for KeyONE, if you looking for something different buy...I don't know...Passport maybe? But the problem is that the BB OS is supported until the end of this year only and you have some problems with applications already.
customer_reviews.author: K. B.

customer_reviews.title: As a loyal BlackBerry user for many years I can ...
customer_reviews.text: As a loyal BlackBerry user for many years I can say that this model is truly a 21st century BlackBerry Hybrid.
customer_reviews.author: Mr London

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic even in 2019!
customer_reviews.text: If u mostly use your phone primarily for text, whatsapp, multiple email accounts and general productivity this is great. It's fine for netflix and youtube too but that's probably not what you're buying it for. Keyboard is great, especially if you set up shortcuts and install fastkey so you can use the convenience key like the speedkey on the key2.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Device..ACE Supplier!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a freelance journalist, and wanted an all rounder with keyboard, for a project in Spain, reporting on a new theme park. It arrived, beautiful pristine condition, booted up, Android/Google allowed his 3rd party apps mixed with their appropriate ones, keyboard easy to pick up..swipes intuitive, videos downloaded, 128G easily inserted, you need a pin tool for that...passed all tests, incredible speed...great experience..oh, and THANKS to Amazing Amazon service..well done all...!
customer_reviews.author: Bunty

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good phone, very well built, nice physical KB - upgraded from a Priv to this - it is light night and day between the two. Although I'm now stick on Android 8 with this phone, it is still fine, apps are still being updated from the Play store, battery still last a long time, and it's still on one piece (screen not popped out yet). I would love to upgrade to a Key2 but the price is still stupid high, I got this for £199 direct from Amazon and not a 3rd party seller, so it was a bit of a bargain
customer_reviews.author: Anita Spanky

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great phone. My partner, loves Blackberry and can't do without a real keyboard. She was reluctant to give up the Blackberry Classic, but this is a good phone. It is bigger and heavier, but it seem many phones are getting bigger. The camera is great and there are n't any negative points about. (If Blackberry do make a smaller version of this phone, I may consider buying one too). It does not have 4K recording, but have not viewed the results yet. The camera quality if great.
customer_reviews.author: Yipee!

customer_reviews.title: Just avoid it and save yourself the financial ball ache.
customer_reviews.text: Phone fell less than 3 feet onto carpet and the screen auto ejected.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dominic Clifton

customer_reviews.title: ... 5 stars but otherwise it's a Blackberry which is perfect. Arrived in excellent condition and with a few ...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't possibly ever give Android 5 stars but otherwise it's a Blackberry which is perfect. Arrived in excellent condition and with a few changes, I have minimised the Android influence (check out F-droid if you're interested). Long live the qwerty phone!
customer_reviews.author: L C

customer_reviews.title: what a great phone
customer_reviews.text: it is not a blackberry as we know it, but it was time for me to join the modern world i guess. and i love it. loads of blackberry style user features and security, with the added bonus of being able to use whatapp and mastertour etc... sound quality is not as good on minijack out as the passport, the keys takke a while to get used to if your a passport user, however the pros outweigh the cons as far as i am concerned. the battery life is also as good as the passport. lasts a couple of days of hardcore use no problem
customer_reviews.author: stageleft

customer_reviews.title: Great value phone.
customer_reviews.text: If you're a Blackberry fan then you won't need any introduction to this phone but if you aren't you should consider it as it offers functional and security features that you will find useful. Typing on the physical keyboard is difficult at first but once mastered much faster and more accurate that a virtual one. Screen is not the best but battery life is stellar. Excellent value at this price as it's about half the first released price. If you haven't tried a Android Blackberry you're in for a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: John Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great phone at this price ,
customer_reviews.text: What a bargain . Looks brilliant, feels great in the hand Better camera than Key2 and most important, no lag due to the extra Ram.....really pleased
customer_reviews.author: simon

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant phone, an improvement on the Priv in every way
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, excellent battery life and so easy to use. The user interface is fluid and apps load quickly. I had a Priv before which was getting a bit long in the tooth - this is a great step up. The stock software is a bit out of date but works well, after setting up there are a few updates you're prompted to install which take it to Android 8.1 Which is a nice improvement. Glad I didn't spend the extra on a Key 2 As this phone is already so good I can't imagine the Key2 Being better.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Deary

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: So i wanted something a bit different so i settled on it. It requires periodically rebooting because it slows down so much it becomes unusable. RAM management issue? Its in the box colelcting dust after having been replaced 6 months later.
customer_reviews.author: kandi_kat

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad.
customer_reviews.text: I'm rather happy with this phone. I was sick of the 'Norman's touchscreen phones with no solid buttons. The phone itself is a tad slow when trying to multitask on the handset. The glass screen is responsive however it is fragile as hell. My child knocked it off a table which is 60cm high on to a thick carpet and the screen cracked so that's a disappointment. Even my iPhones screens have withstood more impact.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Elsom

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing smartphone. I was tired of having to recharge ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing smartphone. I was tired of having to recharge my Iphone twice (at ;east) a day (not to mention the stress of monitoring the battery level). Those days are over. This is a phone vastly superior to the Iphone. It weighs a bit more than other smartphones but it actually makes it easier to operate, especially writing emails (you have access to Bold, colors, etc...). AMAZING.
customer_reviews.author: Halt and Catch Fire

customer_reviews.title: Never going back
customer_reviews.text: Best decision to go back to Blackberry now that they have android OS! Never going to get another HTC, or Samsung. Battery actually lasts a whole day with high use unlike other phones. So far I'm very happy with the phone!
customer_reviews.author: Mutzi

customer_reviews.title: so I am really happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Contacted the seller, got a response promptly and an answer to all my questions. All delivered as promised, even earlier than stated (which in my situation was good) Phone looks brand new, with everything as expected in the packaging, which was very well secured (three layers at least if I remember correctly) This was my dream phone, so I am really happy with this. For now, literally no drawbacks, definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laurynas

customer_reviews.title: It can carry your life with you!
customer_reviews.text: This is a full Android phone with very useful productivity tools like shortcuts and features from Google that integrate some of your apps like Evernote with cloud services. The physical keyboard I like very much but it requires some getting used to. A little heavier too than competing alternatives but quick to charge, long battery life, 4GB Ram and a beautiful camera as well as many other features make this phone stand out.
customer_reviews.author: Ioannis

customer_reviews.title: I feel that this is BB going back to what it does best, and leaving the entirely touchscreen device to the ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are a BB fan you will not need to be convinced. Instead of shying away from the keyboard, or hiding it away in a slider they have brought it back where it belongs! I feel that this is BB going back to what it does best, and leaving the entirely touchscreen device to the others.
customer_reviews.author: JandS

customer_reviews.title: Warehouse Deal - Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: The equipment arrived ahead of time and was in great condition. The problem was the keyboard was defective and 5 keys didn't work and had to send it back. The Keyone appears to be a great phone, looking forward to buy it again soon but this time I'm going to buy it new.
customer_reviews.author: Henrique Santos

customer_reviews.title: Blackberry solid build, with all the usual attributes and more.
customer_reviews.text: I love Blackberry phones, chiefly due to their physical qwerty keyboards and very good cameras and sound. This one has not disappointed and the camera is super on it if your a budding photographer.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Canning

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: What a surprise lighter than I thought ..looks great feels nice in the hand. Soon got used to the keyboard again.so I turned off the virtual keyboard .battery good connected to the car with ease what a breath of fresh air Not the same as other phone's Nice to have the security so they say fast phone love it don't believe all the bad YouTube videos quite fast as well.not a gaming phone but does it well brilliant hope blackberry carry on the good work .
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Stand out,don't be a sheep with an iPhoney
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. Usual Blackberry security. Just a shame it's ruined by Android system. Be different & not one of the brainwashed sheep that keeps buying a slight new model of an iPhoney for a grand a pop! Muppets!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Tee

customer_reviews.title: Front camera problem
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality and in the brief time I used it everything felt really solid and good to use. Sadly, the performance of the front camera on the example I had was terrible and no matter what I did, images were blurry so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: was a fantastic phone, battery life
customer_reviews.text: was a fantastic phone, battery life....sadly had to return as the handset had some issue with the screen freezing, dropped calls due to switching itself on and off after 3 days use....perhaps i was unlucky as the phone looks and feels solid
customer_reviews.author: P. Baines

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone. Works perfectly fine
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. Works perfectly fine, the physical keyboard is a gift from heavens. Awesome battery life. Only downside for me is the placement of convenience buttons, they are perfectly aligned with my thumb and fingers, sort of a minor annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Moved from an iPhone 6S having been a former Blackberry user back in BB10 days. I use the KeyOne for email, social media, texts etc, this isn't really a phone for gaming. For my use, the phone is excellent. Superb battery life (easily 2 days), amazing keyboard and the built in Blackberry software (hub, locker etc) provides ease of use and security. Great phone!
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: ... going BB again but this phone is certainly the best BB I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a BB Passport which eventually stopped working after i did a software update so I was VERY nervous about going BB again but this phone is certainly the best BB I've ever had. The combination of all the unique BB features (especially the HUB) and the android OS certainly offers the best of both worlds. The battery life is also amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic to have a solid android device with physical keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone especially for rapid typing on the physical keyboard. I bought one for personal / work use and its so much better than trying to tap messages into software keyboards of other android devices.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Nickell

customer_reviews.title: Love IT
customer_reviews.text: Great phone love it. Used to be a blackberry fan then went to Iphone then to android. Missed the keypad and this combination is fantastic for me. Android with keypad, what more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Phone
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Blackberry keyboard, minimal android implementation, good battery life, Blackberry Hub and no annoying Google News notifications. Mint condition wharehouse return for £220.
customer_reviews.author: Griff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Great build quality, superb battery life, great camera and almost stock android with quite few BlackBerry tool. Loving the BlackBerry Hub feature. 6 out of 5!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Liangliang Wang

customer_reviews.title: It's the best phone I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why this phone isn't more popular. It's the best phone I've ever owned.I've had it for 3 months now. I've had several Samsungs, a Motorola and a windows phone, it beats all of them. When doing Skype calls my wife says the sound quality is better than any other phone (using the headphones). It does everything I want a phone to do, simply and intuitively.
customer_reviews.author: AndyW

customer_reviews.title: Internal speaker filed within 6 weeks of purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I am, well was, a die hard BB user. I bought this off Amazon Warehouse and the internal speaker failed, a known issue I now see. While Amazon are issuing a full refund it doesnt replace Warehouse items. Looks like I will be off to Samsung or heavens forbid an iphone!
customer_reviews.author: Collie

customer_reviews.title: Best of both worlds
customer_reviews.text: Best of both worlds. Proper Android with a blackberry keyboard for fat fingers that don't work on touch screen keyboards. A really good camera too. Quite big but you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rolland

customer_reviews.title: I love the keyboard
customer_reviews.text: shows some bugs and is a more fragile mobile phone than it seems ... briefly and a good mobile phone with good camera ... good not great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Blackberry KEYone
customer_reviews.text: Love this Blackberry KEYone, much better quality mobile, than the Microsoft Windows 10 Mobile I used to have. Worth every (£) I paid for it. I will be sticking with Blackberry for as long as I have a Mobile.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Only BlackBerry
customer_reviews.text: For me after i bought bbq10, BlackBerry change my mind. For now i don`t see any other choice for me, Only BlackBerry. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tomasz D.

customer_reviews.title: viva blackberry
customer_reviews.text: I Always have a BlackBerry and this one is the best for me, easy product used and set, good design. Thank you blackberry for getting the taste of the day and open its world of applications with google
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect , well balances phone
customer_reviews.text: The perfect working horse, BB + Android makes it a perfect all-rounder, good screen and not as expensive as an Iphone. Really sturdy and battery life is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: carlos lopez

customer_reviews.title: Blackberry back to what it does best.
customer_reviews.text: Very intuitive and a pleasure to use. Best android ever for business users, handles all messaging and social media very well in one hub. Hats off to BlackBerry oh the camera pretty good as well and battery life is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this phone. Was slightly concerned to start with as there was literally just the phone in the box but so far absolutely no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Loo

customer_reviews.title: Boring
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't have purchased the phone if I didn't like it, fed up with stupid questionsa.
customer_reviews.author: William Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I have has this phone for over a year and it is the best phone I have ever had. They keyboard is excellent the battery life is incredible, on moderate use the battery will last two days. It also looks really sleek.
customer_reviews.author: James Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother. My phone stopped working after six months and neither amazon or the seller can help. So I'm stick with a faulty phone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just dont buy!
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst blackberry mobile. Just frezzing all the time and xorupting memory card. For the past 10 years i always use blacknerry mobiles however this is last one i want to use.
customer_reviews.author: nr pg goszczyk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I have made in 2018. Great value for money and cheaper than other suppliers. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Loydall

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I know that Blackberrys aren't for everyone, but I love it, it ha everything that I need. I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Lavendar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone, yes it is Blackberry but for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, yes it is Blackberry but for a fraction of the cost of the alternatives I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Agar

customer_reviews.title: Super cool
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone. Sad to see blackberry os go :( but this device is excellent
customer_reviews.author: bbunyan

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my new Blackberry though shame it is so interlinked with Google
customer_reviews.author: A M.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Really well made phone, Would recommend this to anyone. Also the battery life is ace =D
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: good battery life
customer_reviews.text: phone has loads of high tech , im just not clever enough to use them all
customer_reviews.author: thomas chappell

customer_reviews.title: Screen Falls Off! Make sure you buy it from a retailer with an appropriate warranty!
customer_reviews.text: The screen falls off! So make sure the seller has a warranty of longer than 3 months, unlike mine, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. Very fast delivery by Amazon.co.uk. All good. Enjoying my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F.

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a perfect phone for me!
customer_reviews.text: For years I've been waiting for decent (or ANY) qwerty phone in Europe. Finally! And it's not "a phone with a keyboard" but it is a GREAT phone with a keyboard. I'd give 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: AQ

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, brilliant battery life
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic battery life. Can use this for 2 days at least without charging. As a phone it works brilliantly, it harks back to the blackberry phones of 2010. The convenience key is a great idea, and creating keyboard shortcuts for apps keeps the screen smudge free!
customer_reviews.author: Devraj

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this clever phone which allows me the luxury ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this clever phone which allows me the luxury of a physical keyboard. Im sending this review using my Kindle fire and it's electronic keyboard which makes me feel like a stupid animal that touches screen with its illiterate two fingers. Ive learned to type using all my fingers and I hate being reduced to a state of monkeyness by just using two fingers to type on an electronic keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Minerva

customer_reviews.title: The best phone ever, Camera description and demo pics taken
customer_reviews.text: The best phone ever! By the way, I am a blackberry fan. so anyways I am gonna love the phone. Really great camera, I have attached few photos taken through the camera without any filters, really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ayushman K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone with nice keyboard and incredible battery life. Best BB I've ever had. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: MIQUEL FERRER SUMSI

customer_reviews.title: just a little problem regarding sensor and keyboard but i still think this phone provides good quality. but now i still try something about ...
customer_reviews.text: So far i have used it almost one month, just a little problem regarding sensor and keyboard but i still think this phone provides good quality. but now i still try something about screen cuz its screen is a popular problem that people always talk about. so far there is no problem for using this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Tsai,Chia-Ning

customer_reviews.title: Buck the trend. Go QWERTY.
customer_reviews.text: Deliberated for ages. Really pleased I made this decision. Keyboard takes a few days but quickly became efficient at typing and lots of great features! Eg. Cursor mode, scrolling, shortcuts, swipe up to choose word. Satisfying click. Screen is great. Clear crisp bright. Battery life 2.5 days with moderate use -wow! Runs quickly no lag I think great form factor and holds well in the hands Camera good and speaker average-some voice distortion but I may need to play with with some settings. Blackberry tweaks on android work well and remains highly customisable. Fingerprint reader excellent I do recommend. It bucks the trend but holds itself very well.
customer_reviews.author: smcginley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with my Blackberry
customer_reviews.text: After initial positive feeling I am now extremely disappointed with the Blackberry. Many of my contacts complain about POOR sound quality and they really struggle to hear me.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the screen comes off! what kind of help can I receive?
customer_reviews.author: Joern Lahr

customer_reviews.title: I love my BlackBerry phones and this is no exception.
customer_reviews.text: I adored my BlackBerry Classic phone. It did everything I needed it to do but, sadly, is no longer supported. What a waste of a really good phone. I went for the BlackBerry KeyOne because my husband has one and is pretty much glued to it. I am smitten. It is the keyboard that I love. The fingerprint scanner works well and is an added level of security. It is a great shape and is easy to hold even with small hands. I have it in a gel protector which adds grip. I am loving the android part of it. So far, great in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Simply my best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best smartphone I have owned and I have had many. I must admit to always hankering for something a little different and the KEYone is that alright. Superb build quality, Blackberry's tweaks to Android, the physical keys and all just make for a really pleasant experience. Okay, you have to put up with less than stellar specs, no wall to wall screens and such. But battery life is outstanding and it really is great for Getting through the daily onslaught of various messaging apps. Fancy something out of the ordinary but very capable? Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: MJU

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone to replace my iPhone as I wanted a physical keyboard, touch screen and finger print sensor. This phone looked to be ideal and the reviews were positive. When the phone arrived I was really disappointed to learn that it was incredibly light and felt rather poor quality. The phone just screamed plastic. Although the phone looks good and have lots of cool features it was let down my the quality, the plastic feel just didn’t do it for me. Amazon returns however were very good!
customer_reviews.author: Yawn

customer_reviews.title: Superb.
customer_reviews.text: The phone is simply fantastic and a great upgrade over my Classic. The physical keyboard is a dream. Fast and very efficient with excellent screen. I should have removed one star because the phone did not come with protective self adhesive screen and other covers and the box was closed with cello-tape, giving a used product feel. The packing and presentation of a product is relevant, Blackberry.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful BlackBerry phone
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves BlackBerry phones and was delighted to receive this which is very much in the tradition of the iconic BlackBerry in terms of look and feel, with the physical keyboard. It's also a splendid, lightweight mobile phone which gives excellent service as a phone and a smartphone. The OS is Android 8.1.0 after upgrades. One point to note is that the action button is on the left hand side not the right. Not a problem just a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone
customer_reviews.text: The KeyOne is excellent! I'm not a gamer and the screen is super for my use, mainly for browsing, reading emails and articles etc. It looks great and even better in a transparent silicone case matching the buttons. The fingerprint sensor works immediately and makes it easy to open, aive set the convenience button to sending an email which takes me straight to writing. And I love this keyboard as I don't have to correct much at all!
customer_reviews.author: gakotidig

customer_reviews.title: Blackberry are moving with the times
customer_reviews.text: a solid device with average specs (security software is the bonus feature). With BlackBerry moving away from hardware to security software, one wonders if the KEY series of devices is their farewell tour..... I certainly hope not. No one talks about security until something goes wrong The world STILL needs BlackBerry.
customer_reviews.author: Rickster69

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a far different Blackberry to the one I owned years ago. It is so easy to set up and use. I love having Android on it instead of Blackberry apps. The keyboard is quite fiddly to use compared to my original Blackberry but it isn`t that much of a problem. I love all the features on it and am extremely pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Sandra D Livermore

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've had
customer_reviews.text: I'm a pc tech but the main problem I had was getting data from my laptop onto it. I spent hours doing research and eventually found I had to install a specific USB driver onto my lappy. That doesn't make a lot of sense as all my previous phones were just a simple drag and drop.
customer_reviews.author: laz110

customer_reviews.title: inpressive
customer_reviews.text: the best IV ever owned but the battery sent grate but I think this is fixed in the key 2 go for it if you want something accessible it will surprise you like the in build scrolling in the keypad
customer_reviews.author: Daniel "Alice" harrison

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: this is a great phone. Been using it for months but its starting to show its age. For productivity it's hands down the best.
customer_reviews.author: Najam

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ever
customer_reviews.text: Best phone ever. All thé avantages of BlackBerry and a real keyboard with Android system. You really go raster than with digital phone. I recommend it for profesional use.
customer_reviews.author: Benito C.

customer_reviews.title: HURRAH FOR BLACKBERRY!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased to not only have a BlackBerry again but to have a phone with BUTTONS!! I will never use another phone again as long as BlackBerry is in existence!!
customer_reviews.author: OddSocks

customer_reviews.title: Better in the world 👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Over the moon because I can uses keyboard from old blackberry phone
customer_reviews.author: Michael Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money in my eyes
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a phone WhatsApp and text and searching the Internet. It is excellent and hardworking within these limits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Keyone is worth having.
customer_reviews.text: I am a Blackberry fan and I couldn't wait to get my hands on the Keyone. I'm really pleased with it.plus it has a huge battery life.
customer_reviews.author: D. Conyerd

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful phone for the nostalgic BlackBerry user. Performs well and looks very classy
customer_reviews.author: That one Zambian

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: a great balance of classic blackberry and the new world of android and all the benefits that come with it...best of both worlds in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Geofrey

customer_reviews.title: busy busy the business
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my mum as she needs a good organiser and this was it
customer_reviews.author: N+Plus

customer_reviews.title: This phone is so good, don't have to charge it for 2 to ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is so good, don't have to charge it for 2 to 3 days and I use it alot. Better than iPhone and Samsung crap!
customer_reviews.author: LJellz

customer_reviews.title: Underpowered
customer_reviews.text: Just not enough RAM, skip this and go for the black 4Gb version.
customer_reviews.author: omega27

customer_reviews.title: Best blackberry to date
customer_reviews.text: Best keyboard blackberry I've used with the app store blackberry is finally complete
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Solid and secure
customer_reviews.text: If you want a solid, well-built phone with good battery life and you can't live without a physical keyboard, this is for you. It's not made to be the highest spec phone around; it's built to last and help protect your privacy. I wanted a phone that is going to get important security updates soon after they are released and be supported over the next few years (something BlackBerry are very good at), so this ticks all the boxes for me. If you don't see the point of a phone with a physical keyboard, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gyudon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic device! Can I give six stars?
customer_reviews.text: Having used several smartphones in the last year I consider the KeyOne the best one. The physical keyboard is a dream, I can type without looking at the keys with only few mistakes! The smartphone is very solid, the screen and the camera are excellent. Having Android as Operating System makes this device having the best of both worlds. Well done RIM!
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Tiezzi

customer_reviews.title: I love it! After a first minute of adjusting to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! After a first minute of adjusting to the physical keyboard, I find it one of the best smartphones on the market (it's about prevalent working use): solid, functional, safe
customer_reviews.author: Simone G.

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect! Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Just Perfect! Exceeded my expectations. I believe its the absolute blackberry come back phone and one of the best out in the market!
customer_reviews.author: MR C SAVVA

customer_reviews.title: Android Phone with full Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Brillant phone, a good move from Blackberry to make an Android phone with Keyboard. I experienced some issues with the battery not being regconized after only 3 weeks of used. Hard reboot did not solve issue but it was replaced under warranty and the new one has not yet shown a sign of battery issue. Battery life is huge. Once optimized, you'll be able to run it for a full day of work without worrying having to charge it. Tho, when heavy use, you may have to topup the battery arriving home in the evening (15 - 20% mark), but you'll get a very swift fast topup via the Boost mode
customer_reviews.author: T-S.G

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: I believe that you can expect the most great experience with BlackBerry KEYone, good quality, nice balance with UI and performance. Hence you should be buy it. Don't think, just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: e9ro

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone with New Feel
customer_reviews.text: Used this phone for 3 days now and it's great. Battery is long lasting, screen is a good size with great brightness, the keyboard functions are amazing, the build quality feels sturdy. Only drawback for me it the speaker. It's not loud at all. AND I bought this at £477 and Amazon put the price down the next day to £462. Not happy about that at all
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Better get an iPhone.
customer_reviews.text: Average android telephone which has little in common with the excellent Blackberry Passport or the Bold 9900 devices. I believe that an iPhone is a better option. The screen of the phone got detached without any reason.
customer_reviews.author: Goran

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard 😁
customer_reviews.text: Great having a physical keyboard again - no more autocorrect mashing of my typing. I'd like to see a smaller version of this phone though - it's a bit big in the pocket, and a long reach for the top of the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Mccracken

customer_reviews.title: Screen pop out after few months and the phone started to freeze
customer_reviews.text: Screen pop out after few months and the phone started to freeze without any warning, even while talking. Not so good made for the price that was sold.
customer_reviews.author: A. Loizou

product_meta.title: BlackBerry KEYone 32GB 3GB RAM UK SIM-Free (Single SIM) Smartphone – Silver
product_meta.description:
Style Name:KeyOne SilverBlackBerry KEYone combines a 4.5-inch display (1620x1080 resolution / 434 PPI 3:2 aspect ratio) with Corning Gorilla Glass 4 and physical keypad, tucked into anodized aluminium frame and soft touch textured back, built to offer the best in durability, style, and design. The device also features a 12MP (1.55 m large pixel) rear camera with the industry leading Sony IMX378 sensor, and is powered by Android Nougat 7.1. Powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 625 processor with an Adreno 506 GPU, the BlackBerry KEYone has an efficient, longer battery life, with faster LTE speeds for super-fast file sharing. Qualcomm’s Quick Charge 3.0 technology also makes it possible for the 3505 mAh battery – the largest ever in a BlackBerry device - to receive a 50 percent charge in just 36 minutes. Weight : 180g / 6.34 oz.

BOX CONTAINS
BlackBerry KEYone, Charger
feature_bullets: The first smartphone with a fingerprint sensor built into the keyboard spacebar and touch lit enabled keyboard, with up to 52 programmable shortcuts
100% Full Android Apps and one of the most secure Android smartphones available
4.5-inch touch display with Corning Gorilla Glass 4 with Full HD resolution
12MP auto-focus large pixel rear camera with Sony IMX378, the industry leading camera sensor, and 8MP front camera with wide-angle lens
Huge 3,505mAh battery with Quick Charge capability

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
